channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside UCL, 28th August
item.description:

item.title: Communal bins, 28th August
item.description:
White cat litter has spilt from bin bags from communal bins and an attempt has been made to clear it up by resident but some is still under the bins can the caretakers please use there tools to clean it up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 169, Eglinton Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big historic pothole in road dangerous for cyclists, 28th August
item.description:
This pothole has been here for at least 6 months and has been reported many times. It is getting worse and is a danger to cyclists who have to swerve and cycle into tge road to avoid going down it and causing damage to bicycle wheels. Please get it fixed asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Lansdowne Hill, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 28th August
item.description:
This area has been filled with household items, furniture and trash for more than two months. Neighbours have spoken with the police, with the housing officer, with repairs and others. No action has been taken and the situation has worsened.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Warwick Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Talfourd Place, Peckham, London

item.title: New central reservation installation not wide enough, 28th August
item.description:
There has been a new Central reservation installed, and buses cannot fit through and are mounting pavement. This is causing dangerous pedestrian walkways. As buses are mounting, the pavement possibly causing further deaths and casualties. In order to make this situation safer the pavement will need to be widened and the central reservation needs to be central to the road to allow buses and heavy goods vehicles to pass safely.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Centre Common Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
